metadata.title: Tuesday, 23rd July, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Small and Medium Enterprise Development
parts: (a)    how many marketeers, countrywide, benefited from the marketeer booster loans under the Citizens Economic Empowerment Commission (CEEC), as of December, 2023;
(b)    what criteria are used to determine eligibility of applicants; and
(c)    what challenges, if any, CEEC encounters in disbursing funds.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a)    why the construction of hospitals in the following Wards in Chilubi Parliamentary Constituency has stalled:
(c)    when the projects will be completed; and

(d)    what the cost of the outstanding works, on each project is. 6.    NOTICE OF MOTION Mr R Kangombe Adopt Report of the Committee on Energy, Water Development and Tourism: That this House adopts the Report of the Committee on Energy, Water Development and Tourism on the International Convention on the Protection and Use of Transboundary Watercourses and International Lakes, for the Third Session of the Thirteenth National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on Friday, 19th July, 2024.
